body.content:
Good Day Friend;

I hope this message finds you in good health . I am Grew Mark. A
Solicitor at law, I need you to assist me in repatriating the 4.3
Million US Dollars fund left behind by my Late client Mr Donna Robert
before it gets confiscated or declared unserviceable by the Finance
Firm where this huge amount was deposited.

I await your response.
Thanks and kind regards
